|adm_ctr_of1=town of republic significance of Zelenodolsk |adm_ctr_of1_ref=<ref name="RTatarstan_adm" /> |adm_ctr_of2=[[Zelenodolsky District]] |adm_ctr_of2_ref=<ref name="RTatarstan_adm" /> |mun_district_jur_ref=<ref name="RTatarstanZelenodolskyD_mun">Law #24-ZRT</ref> |urban_settlement_jur=Zelenodolsk Urban Settlement |urban_settlement_jur_ref=<ref name="RTatarstanZelenodolskyD_mun" /> |area_km2_ref= |pop_2010census=97674 |pop_2010census_rank=173rd |pop_2010census_ref=<ref name="2010Census">{{ru-pop-ref|2010Census}}</ref> |pop_density= |pop_density_as_of= |pop_density_ref= |pop_latest= |pop_latest_date= |pop_latest_ref= |established_date=1865 |established_title= |established_date_ref= |current_cat_date=1932 |current_cat_date_ref= |prev_name1= |prev_name1_date= |prev_name1_ref= |postal_codes= |postal_codes_ref= |dialing_codes=8553 |dialing_codes_ref= |website= |website_ref= |commonscat= |date=February 2012 }} '''Zelenodolsk''' ({{lang-ru|Зеленодо́льск}}; {{lang-tt|Яшел Үзән|Yäşel Üzän}}; {{lang-chm|Парат}}, ''Parat'') is a [[types of inhabited localities in Russia|town]] in the [[Republic of Tatarstan]], [[Russia]], located in the northwest of the republic on the left bank of the [[Volga River]], {{convert|38|km|sp=us}} from [[Kazan]]. Population: {{ru-census|p2010=97,674|p2002=100,139|p1989=94,079}} ==Administrative and municipal status== Within the [[subdivisions of Russia#Administrative divisions|framework of administrative divisions]], Zelenodolsk serves as the [[administrative center]] of [[Zelenodolsky District]], even though it is not a part of it.<ref name="RTatarstan_adm" /> As an administrative division, it is incorporated separately as the '''[[city of federal subject significance|town of republic significance]] of Zelenodolsk'''—an administrative unit with the status equal to that of the [[administrative divisions of the Republic of Tatarstan|districts]].<ref name="RTatarstan_adm" /> As a [[subdivisions of Russia#Municipal divisions|municipal division]], the town of republic significance of Zelenodolsk is incorporated within Zelenodolsky Municipal District as '''Zelenodolsk Urban Settlement'''.<ref name="RTatarstanZelenodolskyD_mun" /> ==Economy== Due to its location, Zelenodolsk is an important [[transport hub]] of the republic. It also has a well-known shipbuilding yard ([[Zelenodolsk Factory]]), founded in 1895. During the [[Cold War]], Zelenodolsk was a secret development base for [[warship]]s. ==References== ===Notes=== {{Reflist}} ===Sources=== *{{RussiaAdmMunRef|ta|adm|list}} *{{RussiaAdmMunRef|ta|mun|list|zelenodolsky}} ==External links== *[http://www.zelenodolsk.ru/ Unofficial website of Zelenodolsk] {{ru icon}} {{Republic of Tatarstan}} {{Use mdy dates|date=October 2012}} [[Category:Cities and towns in Tatarstan]]
